title: Risk of Rain 2 pushes ‘Survivors of the Void’ expansion on consoles and Stadia to Q4
content:
After launching on PC last month, the developers behind Risk of Rain 2 have unfortunately confirmed that the “Survivors of the Void” expansion, the game’s first paid DLC, will be delayed to a Q4 release on consoles and Google Stadia.

more…

The post Risk of Rain 2 pushes ‘Survivors of the Void’ expansion on consoles and Stadia to Q4 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The first paid expansion to Risk of Rain 2, "Survivors of the Void," has been delayed on Stadia and consoles to later this year.
